meanings.definition: Showing indifference to comfort or luxury
meanings.sent1: The spartan room had only a small bed and a plain desk.
meanings.sent2: She preferred a spartan lifestyle, avoiding unnecessary extravagance.
meanings.sent3: The spartan traveler refused to stay in any hotel with more than two stars.
meanings.sent4: His spartan diet consisted of only rice and vegetables.
meanings.sent5: The spartan cabin had no electricity or running water, but it was peaceful.

meanings.definition: A person of great courage and self-discipline
meanings.sent1: The spartan faced the challenge head-on, showing no fear.
meanings.sent2: She admired the spartan for their unwavering determination.
meanings.sent3: The spartan warrior never backed down from a fight, no matter the odds.
meanings.sent4: He was known as the spartan of the team, always pushing himself to the limit.
meanings.sent5: The spartan leader inspired his troops with his bravery and resolve.

meanings.definition: Simple or frugal in lifestyle or design
meanings.sent1: The spartan kitchen had only the basic utensils for cooking.
meanings.sent2: They lived in a spartan apartment, with minimal furniture and decorations.
meanings.sent3: Despite his wealth, he chose to live a spartan life, free from excess.
meanings.sent4: Her spartan wardrobe consisted of only a few essential pieces.
meanings.sent5: The spartan office had a desk, chair, and nothing more.
